name: atlassian-principal-software-engineer
title: Principal Full Stack Software Engineer
jobSummary: The Principal Full Stack Software Engineer will join the Loom Distribution Engineering team at Atlassian. This team is responsible for building new distribution channels and seamless experiences to help users discover and engage with our products. As the technical lead, you will drive innovation, ensure application quality, and guide technical direction.
hardSkills: 10+ years industry experience as a Full Stack Engineer
Experience with JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, and modern front-end frameworks (e.g., React)
Deep knowledge of systems engineering at scale, including testing, reliability, security, and observability
Proficiency in GraphQL and scalable web development paradigms
softSkills: Ability to communicate complex technical issues to a range of audiences
Mentorship and growth of junior engineers

candidateProfile.education: Bachelors, Masters, or PhD in Computer Science or a related technical field, or equivalent experience
candidateProfile.experience: 10+ years of experience in full stack development and engineering leadership
candidateProfile.expertise: Proven track record of technical excellence, scalability, and reliability in system design and implementation

responsibilities: Tackle the largest and most complex technical problems, from design to launch
Guide the technical direction and implementation of large-scale product features
Evangelize high technical standards across the organization
Implement and promote the use of modern tools like GraphQL, Node.js, and React
Share knowledge and best practices to improve engineering excellence
Mentor and develop future technical leaders
Partner with cross-disciplinary leads to define product and technical strategy
experience: 10+ years of industry experience in full stack development with a focus on scalability, testing, and system reliability
